sentences.sContent: The funds will be used for marketing and product development.
sentences.sCn: 这笔资金将用于市场营销和产品开发。

sentences.sContent: ...as cities across the country imitate the walkability and transit-oriented development making cities like New York and San Francisco so successful...
...Today's presentation will show how we see the development of the motor car in the short to medium term...
...Americans have taken for granted the United States' leadership position in the development of new technologies...
...Our ability to experience sympathy is essential to the development of civilization...
...The development of self-consciousness and the notion of individual identity...
...But crying as an expression of feeling is unique to humans and has played an essential role in human evolution and the development of human cultures...
...Today’s presentation will show how we see the development of the motor car in the short to medium term...
...Due to the wide use of computers and the development of Internet...

synos.tran: 发展；开发；[生物]发育；[建]住宅小区（专指由同一开发商开发的）；[摄]显影

phrases.pCn: 未来的发展前景，未来发展
发展进程，显色法；开发流程，开发程序
开发史；成长历程；发展进程

words.tran: 发达的（国家或地区）；成熟的
开发；进步；使成长；使显影

trans.tranOther: the process of gradually becoming bigger, better, stronger, or more advanced
